name: The Seed (JadeStaines)
description:
The Seed is a first-person horror game where you are a one-member rescue team and have been sent below the surface to discover what happened to a group of scientists who lost contact with the surface 36 hours ago.

In the game, you explore and discover what happened while overcoming puzzles to reroute power. 

Good Luck!

Credits: 
Dylan Thomas, Lewis Staines, Jack Beaumont, Jade Staines, Wyn Evans
